Eidolons.Name: Stride, Spoils Seized
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Sweep, Souls Slain
Eidolons.Effect:
Each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action will make the target enemy Vulnerable.
While Vulnerable, enemies receive 12% more DMG until the end of the Lightning-Lord's current turn, stacking up to 3 time(s).

Eidolons.Name: Blade Cuts the Deepest in Hell
Eidolons.Effect:
Blade's Ultimate deals additionally increased DMG to a single enemy target, with the increased amount equal to 150% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle.
The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at 90% of his Max HP. The tally value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

Eidolons.Name: Ten Thousand Sorrows From One Broken Dream
Eidolons.Effect: When Blade is in the Hellscape state, his CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

Eidolons.Name: Hardened Blade Bleeds Coldest Shade
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Rejected by Death, Infected With Life
Eidolons.Effect: When Blade's current HP drops to 50% or lower of his Max HP, increases his Max HP by 20%. Stacks up to 2 time(s).

Eidolons.Name: Death By Ten Lords' Gaze
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Reborn Into an Empty Husk
Eidolons.Effect: The maximum number of Charge stacks is reduced to 4. The DMG of the follow-up attack triggered by Blade's Talent additionally increases by 50% of his Max HP.

Eidolons.Name: Cut With Ease
Eidolons.Effect: After using Skill against a Weakness Broken enemy, regenerates 1 Skill Point.

Eidolons.Name: Refine in Toil
Eidolons.Effect: After Sword Stance is triggered, the DMG taken by Sushang is reduced by 20% for 1 turn.

Eidolons.Name: Rise From Fame
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Cleave With Heart
Eidolons.Effect: Sushang's Break Effect increases by 40%.

Eidolons.Name: Prevail via Taixu
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Dwell Like Water
Eidolons.Effect: Talent's SPD Boost is stackable and can stack up to 2 times. Additionally, after entering battle, Sushang immediately gains 1 stack of her Talent's SPD Boost.

Eidolons.Name: Aerial Marshal
Eidolons.Effect: At the start of battle, increases the SPD of all allies by 10% for 2 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Skyward Command
Eidolons.Effect: When any ally's current energy is equal to its energy limit, Yukong regenerates an additional 5 energy. This effect can only be triggered once for each ally. The trigger count is reset after Yukong uses her Ultimate.

Eidolons.Name: Torrential Fusillade
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Zephyrean Echoes
Eidolons.Effect: When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, Yukong deals 30% more DMG to enemies.

Eidolons.Name: August Deadshot
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Bowstring Thunderclap
Eidolons.Effect: When Yukong uses her Ultimate, she immediately gains 1 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings."

Eidolons.Name: Dominus Pacis
Eidolons.Effect: The Knowledge effect increases CRIT DMG by 30%.

Eidolons.Name: Optimus Felix
Eidolons.Effect: If any team member is struck by a killing blow while Matrix of Prescience is active, then all allies who were struck by a killing blow during this action will not be knocked down, and 70% of their Max HP is immediately restored. This effect can trigger 1 time per battle.

Eidolons.Name: Apex Nexus
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Fortuna Stellaris
Eidolons.Effect: When other allies under Matrix of Prescience are attacked, Fu Xuan regenerates 5 Energy.

Eidolons.Name: Arbiter Primus
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Omnia Vita
Eidolons.Effect:
Once Matrix of Prescience is activated, it will keep a tally of the total HP lost by all team members in the current battle. Fu Xuan's Ultimate DMG will increase by 200% of this tally of HP loss.
This tally is also capped at 120% of Fu Xuan's Max HP and the tally value will reset and re-accumulate after Fu Xuan's Ultimate is used.

Eidolons.Name: Svelte Saber
Eidolons.Effect: When Yanqing attacks a Frozen enemy, he deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 60% of his ATK.

Eidolons.Name: Supine Serenade
Eidolons.Effect: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Energy Regeneration Rate increases by an extra 10%.

Eidolons.Name: Sword Savant
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Searing Sting
Eidolons.Effect: When the current HP percentage is 80% or higher, Ice RES PEN increases by 12%.

Eidolons.Name: Surging Strife
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Swift Swoop
Eidolons.Effect: If the buffs from Soulsteel Sync or the Ultimate are in effect when an enemy is defeated, the duration of these buffs is extended by 1 turn.

Eidolons.Name: Slurping Noodles During Handstand
Eidolons.Effect: When Skill is used, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the attacked target enemy's Effect RES by 10% for 2 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Brushing Teeth While Whistling
Eidolons.Effect: When an enemy target is being Burned, the DMG multiplier of the Burn status applied by her Basic ATK or Skill increases by 40%.

Eidolons.Name: Smashing Boulder on Chest
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Blocking Pike with Neck
Eidolons.Effect: Every time the Burn status inflicted by Guinaifen causes DMG, Guinaifen regenerates 2 Energy.

Eidolons.Name: Swallowing Sword to Stomach
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Catching Bullet with Hands
Eidolons.Effect: Increases the stackable Firekiss count by 1.

Eidolons.Name: Ambrosial Aqua
Eidolons.Effect: If the target ally's current HP is equal to their Max HP when Invigoration ends, regenerates 8 extra Energy for this target.

Eidolons.Name: Sylphic Slumber
Eidolons.Effect: After using her Ultimate, Bailu's Outgoing Healing increases by an additional 15% for 2 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Omniscient Opulence
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Evil Excision
Eidolons.Effect: Every healing provided by the Skill makes the recipient deal 10% more DMG for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 3 time(s).

Eidolons.Name: Waning Worries
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Drooling Drop of Draconic Divinity
Eidolons.Effect: Bailu can heal allies who received a killing blow 1 more time(s) in a single battle.

Eidolons.Name: Moon Crashes Tianguan Gate
Eidolons.Effect: When using her Ultimate or Enhanced Skill, Jingliu's CRIT DMG increases by 24% for 1 turn(s). If only one enemy target is attacked, the target will additionally be dealt Ice DMG equal to 100% of Jingliu's ATK.

Eidolons.Name: Crescent Shadows Qixing Dipper
Eidolons.Effect: After using Ultimate, increases the DMG of the next Enhanced Skill by 80%.

Eidolons.Name: Halfmoon Gapes Mercurial Haze
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Lunarlance Shines Skyward Dome
Eidolons.Effect: During the Spectral Transmigration state, the ATK gained from consuming allies' HP is additionally increased by 90% of the total HP consumed from the entire team. The cap for ATK gained this way also increases by 30%.

Eidolons.Name: Night Shades Astral Radiance
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Eclipse Hollows Corporeal Husk
Eidolons.Effect: When Jingliu enters the Spectral Transmigration state, the Syzygy stack limit increases by 1, and Jingliu obtains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy. While she is in the Spectral Transmigration state, her CRIT DMG increases by 50%.

Eidolons.Name: Tethered to Sky
Eidolons.Effect: Increases the stackable Righteous Heart count by 4, and gains 1 extra stack of Righteous Heart for each hit during an attack.

Eidolons.Name: Imperium On Cloud Nine
Eidolons.Effect: After using his Ultimate, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's action is Advanced Forward by 100% and gains 1 extra Squama Sacrosancta.

Eidolons.Name: Clothed in Clouds
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Zephyr's Bliss
Eidolons.Effect: The buff effect granted by Outroar lasts until the end of this character's next turn.

Eidolons.Name: Fall is the Pride
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Reign, Returned
Eidolons.Effect: After any other ally uses their Ultimate, the Imaginary RES PEN of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's next Fulgurant Leap attack increases by 20%. This effect can stack up to 3 time(s).

Eidolons.Name: Dvesha, Inhibited
Eidolons.Effect: Increases the DMG dealt by the Talent's follow-up attack by 40%.

Eidolons.Name: Klesha, Breached
Eidolons.Effect: Talent's follow-up attack reduces enemy Toughness regardless of Weakness types. At the same time, restores Xueyi's HP by an amount equal to 5% of her Max HP. When breaking Weakness, triggers the Quantum Break Effect.

Eidolons.Name: Duḥkha, Ceased
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Karma, Severed
Eidolons.Effect: When using Ultimate, increases Break Effect by 40% for 2 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Deva, Enthralled
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Saṃsāra, Mastered
Eidolons.Effect: The max stack limit for Karma decreases to 6.

Eidolons.Name: One Heart
Eidolons.Effect: When an ally with Hanya's Ultimate's effect defeats an enemy, Hanya's action is Advanced Forward by 15%. This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) per turn.

Eidolons.Name: Two Views
Eidolons.Effect: After using the Skill, this character's SPD increases by 20% for 1 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Three Temptations
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Four Truths
Eidolons.Effect: The Ultimate's duration is additionally extended for 1 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Five Skandhas
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Six Reverences
Eidolons.Effect: Increase the DMG Boost effect of the Talent by an additional 10%.

Eidolons.Name: Anchored to Vessel, Specters Nestled
Eidolons.Effect: The duration of Divine Provision produced by the Talent is extended by 1 turn(s). When Huohuo possesses Divine Provision, all allies' SPD increases by 12%.

Eidolons.Name: Sealed in Tail, Wraith Subdued
Eidolons.Effect: If Huohuo possesses Divine Provision when an ally is struck by a killing blow, the ally will not be knocked down, and their HP will immediately be restored by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP. This reduces the duration of Divine Provision by 1 turn. This effect can only be triggered 2 time(s) per battle.

Eidolons.Name: Cursed by Fate, Moths to Flame
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Tied in Life, Bound to Strife
Eidolons.Effect: When healing a target ally via Skill or Talent, the less HP the target ally currently has, the higher the amount of healing they will receive. The maximum increase in healing provided by Huohuo is 80%.

Eidolons.Name: Mandated by Edict, Evils Evicted
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Woven Together, Cohere Forever
Eidolons.Effect: When healing a target ally, increases the target ally's DMG dealt by 50% for 2 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: A Lacuna in Kingdom of Aesthetics
Eidolons.Effect: Each stack of Apotheosis additionally increases CRIT DMG by 4%.

Eidolons.Name: Agate's Humility
Eidolons.Effect: If the number of enemies on the field equals to 3 or more when the Ultimate is used, ATK increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Thorny Road's Glory
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Trumpet's Dedication
Eidolons.Effect: At the start of battle, gains 2 stack(s) of Apotheosis and increases the maximum stack limit of the Talent's effect by 2.

Eidolons.Name: Snow, From Somewhere in Cosmos
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: "Your" Resplendence
Eidolons.Effect: When using Ultimate, ignores 30% of enemy targets' DEF.

Eidolons.Name: Neuronic Embroidery
Eidolons.Effect: While the Ultimate's field is deployed, the DMG dealt by all allies ignores 20% of the target's DEF.

Eidolons.Name: Reedside Promenade
Eidolons.Effect: With Ruan Mei on the field, all allies increase their ATK by 40% when dealing DMG to enemies with Weakness Break.

Eidolons.Name: Viridescent Pirouette
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Chatoyant Éclat
Eidolons.Effect: When an enemy target's Weakness is Broken, Ruan Mei's Break Effect increases by 100% for 3 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Languid Barrette
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Sash Cascade
Eidolons.Effect: Extends the duration of the Ultimate's field by 1 turn(s). The Talent's Break DMG multiplier additionally increases by 200%.

Eidolons.Name: Pride Comes Before a Fall
Eidolons.Effect: The maximum stackable count for the Trace "Summation" increases by 4. When a battle begins, immediately obtains 4 stacks of Summation. Needs to unlock Summation first.

Eidolons.Name: The Divine Is in the Details
Eidolons.Effect: When his Talent's follow-up attack hits a target, for every debuff the target has, additionally deals Imaginary Additional DMG equal to 20% of Dr. Ratio's ATK. This effect can be triggered for a maximum of 4 time(s) during each follow-up attack.

Eidolons.Name: Know Thyself
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Ignorance Is Blight
Eidolons.Effect: When triggering the Talent, additionally regenerates 15 Energy for Dr. Ratio.

Eidolons.Name: Sic Itur Ad Astra
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Vincit Omnia Veritas
Eidolons.Effect: Additionally increases the triggerable count for Wiseman's Folly by 1. The DMG dealt by the Talent's follow-up attack increases by 50%.

Eidolons.Name: Suspension of Disbelief
Eidolons.Effect: The Cipher effect granted by the Ultimate lasts for 1 extra turn. All allies with Cipher have their ATK increased by 40%.

Eidolons.Name: Purely Fictitious
Eidolons.Effect: Every stack of the Talent's effect allows allies to additionally ignore 8% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG.

Eidolons.Name: Pipedream
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Life Is a Gamble
Eidolons.Effect: The Ultimate recovers 1 more Skill Point. The Talent additionally increases the Max Skill Points by 1.

Eidolons.Name: Parallax Truth
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Narrative Polysemy
Eidolons.Effect: The CRIT DMG Boost effect provided by the Skill additionally increases by an amount equal to 30% of Sparkle's CRIT DMG. When Sparkle uses Skill, her Skill's CRIT DMG Boost effect will apply to all allies with Cipher. When Sparkle uses her Ultimate, any single ally who benefits from her Skill's CRIT DMG Boost will spread that effect to allies with Cipher.

Eidolons.Name: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
Eidolons.Effect: While Black Swan is active in battle, enemies afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock will have their corresponding Wind, Physical, Fire, or Lightning RES respectively reduced by 25%.

Eidolons.Name: Weep Not For Me, My Lamb
Eidolons.Effect: When an enemy target afflicted with Arcana is defeated, there is a 100% base chance of inflicting 6 stack(s) of Arcana on adjacent targets.

Eidolons.Name: As Above, So Below
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: In Tears We Gift
Eidolons.Effect: While in the Epiphany state, enemy targets have their Effect RES reduced by 10%. And at the start of their turn or when they get defeated, Black Swan regenerates 8 Energy. This Energy Regeneration effect can only trigger up to 1 time while Epiphany lasts. And the trigger count resets when Epiphany is applied again.

Eidolons.Name: Linnutee Flyway
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Pantheon Merciful, Masses Pitiful
Eidolons.Effect:
When an enemy target gets attacked by Black Swan's allies, Black Swan has a 65% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target.
Every time Black Swan inflicts Arcana on an enemy target, there is a 50% fixed chance to additionally increase the number of Arcana stacked this time by 1.

Eidolons.Name: Whimsicality of Fancy
Eidolons.Effect: When using the Ultimate, for every enemy on the field, additionally increases the Hits Per Action for the current Ultimate by 1 hit(s), up to a maximum increase of 5 hit(s).

Eidolons.Name: Yearning of Youth
Eidolons.Effect: Before each hit of the Ultimate lands, there is a 24% base chance of reducing the target's DEF by 16% for 3 turn(s).

Eidolons.Name: Vestige of Happiness
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: Visage of Kinship
Eidolons.Effect: Increases the DMG multiplier for each hit of the Ultimate by 6%.

Eidolons.Name: Genesis of First Love
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: Estrangement of Dream
Eidolons.Effect: When using the Ultimate, increases own DMG by 30%, lasting until the end of the turn. In addition, the next time the Skill is used, recovers 1 Skill Point(s) for the team.

Eidolons.Name: A Falling Star
Eidolons.Effect: When enemies are defeated due to the Trailblazer's Ultimate, the Trailblazer regenerates 10 extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per attack.

Eidolons.Name: An Unwilling Host
Eidolons.Effect: Attacking enemies with Physical Weakness restores the Trailblazer's HP equal to 5% of the Trailblazer's ATK.

Eidolons.Name: A Leading Whisper
Eidolons.Effect:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Eidolons.Name: A Destructing Glance
Eidolons.Effect: When attacking an enemy with Weakness Break, CRIT Rate is increased by 25%.

Eidolons.Name: A Surviving Hope
Eidolons.Effect:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Eidolons.Name: A Trailblazing Will
Eidolons.Effect: The Trailblazer's Talent is also triggered when they defeat an enemy.

Eidolons.Name: A Trailblazing Will
Eidolons.Effect: The Trailblazer's Talent is also triggered when they defeat an enemy.

Eidolons.Name: Earth-Shaking Resonance
Eidolons.Effect: When the Trailblazer uses their Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to 25% of the Trailblazer's DEF. When the Trailblazer uses their enhanced Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of the Trailblazer's DEF.

Eidolons.Name: Time-Defying Tenacity

Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
